mainText:
Even though I didn't know him and I'm just 14, I feel like I just lost a 
close friend, seriously, he was my idol, I loved him, he was one of the 
reasons I started to choose Apple instead of any other company, his way 
of thinking, his sympathy when giving speeches, his simplicity and 
humility, he was the best man I ever heard of. Rest In Peace Steve, my 
idol, visionary and genius.
author: Tomas
